mapper.select: SELECT fr.* FROM FD_REPORT fr JOIN FD_PROJECT_MAP_CATEGORY fpmc ON fpmc.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} JOIN FD_PROJECT_CATEGORY fpc ON fpc.id = fpmc.CATEGORY_ID JOIN FD_REPORT_PROJECT_CATEGORY frpc ON frpc.REPORT_ID = fr.id AND frpc.PROJECT_CATEGORY = fpc.`CODE` AND fr.MODULE= #{module} GROUP BY fr.ID
